reviewText: this film features scenes of a forest shot in 3d.  It has soothing music too. IT's not a real documentary.  It's just a mood film.  if you don't like those type of film , then don't buy this one. If you could find one that is. It's out of print.
The 3-D was decent but due to the nature shots there was not enough contrast to be better.  Soothing musici though.
This DVD would not load. I have a 3D smart tv and 3D DVD player and yet this DVD could not be recognized or viewed. In the trash...
